verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> they drew nigh <S%G1448><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> Bethphage <S%G967><s%>, unto <S%G4314><s%> the mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives <S%G1636><s%>, then <S%G5119><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>,

saying <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Go <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the village <S%G2968><s%> that is over against <S%G561><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> ye shall find <S%G2147><s%> an ass <S%G3688><s%> tied <S%G1210><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> a colt <S%G4454><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> her <S%G846><s%>: loose <S%G3089><s%> them <S%G71><s%>, and bring them unto me <S%G3427><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> one say <S%G2036><s%> aught <S%G5100><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, ye shall say <S%G3754><s%>, The Lord <S%G2962><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of them <S%G846><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> he will send <S%G649><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

Now <S%G3650><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> is come to pass <S%G1096><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> it might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> which was spoken <S%G4483><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the prophet <S%G4396><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>,

Tell ye <S%G2036><s%> the daughter <S%G2364><s%> of Zion <S%G4622><s%>, Behold <S%G2400><s%>, thy <S%G4675><s%> King <S%G935><s%> cometh <S%G2064><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%>, Meek <S%G4239><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> riding <S%G1910><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> an ass <S%G3688><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> upon a colt <S%G4454><s%> the foal <S%G5207><s%> of an ass <S%G5268><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> went <S%G4198><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> even as <S%G2531><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> appointed <S%G4367><s%> them <S%G846><s%>,

and brought <S%G71><s%> the ass <S%G3688><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the colt <S%G4454><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> put <S%G2007><s%> on <S%G1883><s%> them <S%G846><s%> their <S%G846><s%> garments <S%G2440><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he sat <S%G1940><s%> thereon <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3793><s%> most <S%G4118><s%> part of the multitude <S%G3793><s%> spread <S%G4766><s%> their <S%G1438><s%> garments <S%G2440><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the way <S%G1161><s%>; and others <S%G243><s%> cut <S%G2875><s%> branches <S%G2798><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the trees <S%G1186><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> spread <S%G4766><s%> them in <S%G1722><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> that went before <S%G4254><s%> him <S%G2532><s%>, and that followed <S%G190><s%>, cried <S%G2896><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Hosanna <S%G5614><s%> to the son <S%G5207><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%>: Blessed <S%G2127><s%> is he that cometh <S%G2064><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%>; Hosanna <S%G5614><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the highest <S%G5310><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G1525><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was come <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%>, all <S%G3956><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%> was stirred <S%G4579><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Who <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> this <S%G3778><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> said <S%G3004><s%>, This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the prophet <S%G4396><s%>, Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, from <S%G575><s%> Nazareth <S%G3478><s%> of Galilee <S%G1056><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> cast out <S%G1544><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> them that sold <S%G4453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bought <S%G59><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> overthrew <S%G2690><s%> the tables <S%G5132><s%> of the money-changers <S%G2855><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the seats <S%G2515><s%> of them that sold <S%G4453><s%> the doves <S%G4058><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, It is written <S%G1125><s%>, My <S%G3450><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> shall be called <S%G2564><s%> a house <S%G3624><s%> of prayer <S%G4335><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> it <S%G846><s%> a den <S%G4693><s%> of robbers <S%G3027><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the blind <S%G5185><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the lame <S%G5560><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he healed <S%G2323><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G1492><s%> the chief priests <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the scribes <S%G1122><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> the wonderful things <S%G2297><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> he did <S%G4160><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the children <S%G3816><s%> that were crying <S%G2896><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%>, Hosanna <S%G5614><s%> to the son <S%G5207><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%>; they were moved with indignation <S%G23><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Hearest thou <S%G191><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> are saying <S%G3004><s%>? And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Yea <S%G3483><s%>: did ye <S%G314><s%> never <S%G3763><s%> read <S%G3754><s%>, Out <S%G1537><s%> of the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of babes <S%G3516><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sucklings <S%G2337><s%> thou has perfected <S%G2675><s%> praise <S%G136><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> he left <S%G2641><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and went <S%G1831><s%> forth out <S%G1854><s%> of the city <S%G4172><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Bethany <S%G963><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> lodged <S%G835><s%> there <S%G1563><s%>.
Now <S%G1161><s%> in the morning <S%G4405><s%> as he returned <S%G1877><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%>, he hungered <S%G3983><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> seeing <S%G1492><s%> a <S%G1520><s%> fig tree <S%G4808><s%> by <S%G1909><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> side <S%G2064><s%>, he came to <S%G1909><s%> it <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> thereon <S%G846><s%>, but <S%G1487><s%> leaves <S%G5444><s%> only <S%G3440><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> unto it <S%G846><s%>, Let <S%G1096><s%> there be <S%G1096><s%> no <S%G3371><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%> henceforward for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> immediately <S%G3916><s%> the fig tree <S%G4808><s%> withered away <S%G3583><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G1492><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> it <S%G2296><s%>, they marvelled, saying <S%G3004><s%>, How <S%G4459><s%> did <S%G3583><s%> the fig tree <S%G4808><s%> immediately <S%G3916><s%> wither away <S%G3583><s%>?

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G2036><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, If <S%G1437><s%> ye have <S%G2192><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> doubt <S%G1252><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>, ye shall <S%G4160><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> what <S%G3588><s%> is done to the fig tree <S%G4808><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> even if <S%G2579><s%> ye shall say <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G3735><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> mountain <S%G3735><s%>, Be thou taken up <S%G142><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%>, it shall be done <S%G1096><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>, whatsoever <S%G3745><s%> ye <S%G2532><s%> shall ask <S%G154><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> prayer <S%G4335><s%>, believing <S%G4100><s%>, ye shall receive <S%G2983><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G2064><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was come <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%>, the chief priests <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the elders <S%G4245><s%> of the people <S%G2992><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> as he was teaching <S%G1321><s%>, and said <S%G3004><s%>, By <S%G1722><s%> what <S%G4169><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> doest thou <S%G4160><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>? and <S%G2532><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, I also <S%G2504><s%> will ask <S%G2065><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> question <S%G3056><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> ye tell <S%G2036><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>, I likewise <S%G2504><s%> will tell <S%G2046><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> what <S%G4169><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> I do <S%G4160><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>.

The baptism <S%G908><s%> of John <S%G2491><s%>, whence <S%G4159><s%> was it <S%G2258><s%>? from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> men <S%G444><s%>? And <S%G1161><s%> they reasoned <S%G1260><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, If <S%G1437><s%> we shall say <S%G2036><s%>, From <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>; he will say <S%G2046><s%> unto us <S%G1223><s%>, Why <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> did ye <S%G4100><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> him <S%G846><s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> we shall say <S%G2036><s%>, From <S%G1537><s%> men <S%G444><s%>; we fear <S%G5399><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> hold <S%G2192><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a prophet <S%G4396><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they answered <S%G611><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, and said <S%G2036><s%>, We <S%G1492><s%> know not <S%G3756><s%>. He <S%G846><s%> also said <S%G5346><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Neither <S%G3761><s%> tell <S%G3004><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> what <S%G4169><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> I do <S%G4160><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> think <S%G1380><s%> ye <S%G5213><s%>? A man <S%G444><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> sons <S%G5043><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he came <S%G4334><s%> to the first <S%G4413><s%>, and said <S%G2036><s%>, Son <S%G5043><s%>, go <S%G5217><s%> work <S%G2038><s%> to-day <S%G4594><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3450><s%> vineyard <S%G290><s%>.
And he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%>, I will <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> afterward <S%G5305><s%> he repented <S%G3338><s%> himself <S%G565><s%>, and went.

And <S%G2532><s%> he came <S%G4334><s%> to the second <S%G1208><s%>, and said <S%G2036><s%> likewise <S%G5615><s%>. And <S%G1161><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> go <S%G2962><s%>, sir: and <S%G2532><s%> went <S%G565><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>.

Which <S%G5101><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the two <S%G1417><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of his father <S%G3962><s%>? They say <S%G3004><s%>, The first <S%G4413><s%>. Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> the publicans <S%G5057><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the harlots <S%G4204><s%> go <S%G4254><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G4254><s%> before <S%G4254><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ye believed <S%G4100><s%> him <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> the publicans <S%G5057><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the harlots <S%G4204><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> him <S%G846><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%>, when ye saw <S%G1492><s%> it <S%G3756><s%>, did not even repent <S%G3338><s%> yourselves afterward <S%G5305><s%>, that <S%G3588><s%> ye might believe <S%G4100><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

Hear <S%G191><s%> another <S%G243><s%> parable <S%G444><s%>: There was <S%G2258><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> that was a householder <S%G3617><s%>, who <S%G3748><s%> planted <S%G5452><s%> a vineyard <S%G290><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> set a hedge <S%G5418><s%> about <S%G4060><s%> it <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> digged <S%G3736><s%> a winepress <S%G3025><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> it <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> built <S%G3618><s%> a tower <S%G4444><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> let <S%G1554><s%> it <S%G846><s%> out <S%G1554><s%> to husbandmen <S%G1092><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> went into another country <S%G589><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> the season <S%G2540><s%> of the fruits <S%G2590><s%> drew near <S%G1448><s%>, he sent <S%G649><s%> his <S%G846><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the husbandmen <S%G1092><s%>, to receive <S%G2983><s%> his <S%G846><s%> fruits <S%G2590><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the husbandmen <S%G1092><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> his <S%G846><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%>, and beat <S%G1194><s%> one <S%G3303><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> killed <S%G615><s%> another <S%G3739><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> stoned <S%G3036><s%> another <S%G3739><s%>.

Again <S%G3825><s%>, he sent <S%G649><s%> other <S%G243><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> more <S%G4119><s%> than the first <S%G4413><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they did <S%G4160><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> in like manner <S%G5615><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> afterward he sent <S%G649><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them <S%G846><s%> his <S%G846><s%> son <S%G5207><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, They will reverence <S%G1788><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> son <S%G5207><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> the husbandmen <S%G1092><s%>, when <S%G1492><s%> they saw <S%G1492><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%>, said <S%G2036><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%>, This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the heir <S%G2818><s%>; come <S%G1205><s%>, let us kill <S%G615><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> take <S%G2722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> inheritance <S%G2817><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> they took <S%G2983><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and cast <S%G1544><s%> him forth out <S%G1854><s%> of the vineyard <S%G290><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> killed him <S%G615><s%>.

When <S%G3752><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the lord <S%G2962><s%> of the vineyard <S%G290><s%> shall come <S%G2064><s%>, what <S%G5101><s%> will he do <S%G4160><s%> unto <S%G1092><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> husbandmen <S%G1092><s%>?
